item.title: Rabbitmq
item.description: AMQP AMQP: Advanced Message Queue Protocol. AMQP是高级消息队列协议．是异步消息传递所使用的应用层协议规范． 常用的开源AMQP框架： https://github.com/rabbitmq https://github.com/apache/kafka https://github.com/apache/activemq Rabbitmq https://github.com/rabbitmq RabbitMQ是一个erl
